Key Match Events: Yerson Mosquera opened the scoring in the 25th minute
Nico González equalized in the 48th minute
James Rodríguez scored a penalty to secure the win in the 60th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi did not play due to injury
This was the first match between the teams since the Copa América final
Post-Match Reflections: James Rodriguez gave a perfect cross for Mosquera to open the scoring
A mistake by Rodríguez allowed Argentina to equalize
Rodríguez made amends with a penalty goal
Argentina's strikers Lautaro Martínez and Julián Álvarez failed to offer as much danger without Messi
Miscellaneous Highlights: Colombia is still unbeaten in South American World Cup qualifying
James Rodriguez equalized Carlos Valderrama's record of 11 assists in South American World Cup qualifying
